author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The popular television series The Last of Us is facing backlash for including a lesbian sex scene. It’s not the first time the series has faced such backlash, as the first season included gay characters and plot lines that were met with similar online turmoil. title: ‘The Last Of Us’ Faces Backlash For Lesbian Sex Scene
